p: For all analysis p-values are reported. To determine genome-wide significance we applied a p-value threshold of 2.97E-08 which applies a Bonferroni adjustment for 1,679,420 SNPs that remained after filtering on an r2 of 0.8 [ 19] Further adjustments for analyses of subsets of the dataset were not applied. Association results of variants with a dbSNP reference SNP identifier, v142 from GWAS and interaction analyses were tested for enrichment of gene sets in the Gene Ontology [ 4, 53] database using GSA-SNP2 [ 36] software with selected options of European, padding of 20 kb, build GRCh37 (hg19), and pathway size window of 10–200.
